head.title: United States Forecast

meta.name: description
meta.content: Trading Economics provides data for 20 million economic indicators from 196 countries including actual values, consensus figures, forecasts, historical time series and news. United States Forecast - was last updated on Monday, June 13, 2022.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: United States Forecast, economic indicators, data, actual values, historical, time series, forecasts, news

body.script: IsDarkMode=false;

input.style: font-size: 1.1em; border: 0px; color: #333; border-bottom: 1px solid #858585; background-color: transparent;

ul.style: position: fixed; width: 100%; top: 42px; border-top-color: #FFF; display: block; padding: 0; border: 0;

br.span: Download historical data for 20 million indicators using your browser.
Direct access to our data from your apps using any programing language.

a.br: Manage your notifications for calendar releases and financial markets.

meta.name: description
meta.content: Trading Economics provides data for 20 million economic indicators from 196 countries including actual values, consensus figures, forecasts, historical time series and news. Brazil Forecast - was last updated on Monday, June 13, 2022.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Brazil Forecast, economic indicators, data, actual values, historical, time series, forecasts, news

body.script: IsDarkMode=false;

input.style: font-size: 1.1em; border: 0px; color: #333; border-bottom: 1px solid #858585; background-color: transparent;

ul.style: position: fixed; width: 100%; top: 42px; border-top-color: #FFF; display: block; padding: 0; border: 0;

br.span: Download historical data for 20 million indicators using your browser.
Direct access to our data from your apps using any programing language.

a.br: Manage your notifications for calendar releases and financial markets.

td.a: Current Account to GDP (% of GDP)
Government Debt to GDP (% of GDP)
Current Account to GDP (% of GDP)
Government Debt to GDP (% of GDP)
Households Debt To GDP (% of GDP)

Copyright ©2022 TRADING ECONOMICS
All Rights Reserved

head.title: Russia Forecast

meta.name: description
meta.content: Trading Economics provides data for 20 million economic indicators from 196 countries including actual values, consensus figures, forecasts, historical time series and news. Russia Forecast - was last updated on Monday, June 13, 2022.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Russia Forecast, economic indicators, data, actual values, historical, time series, forecasts, news

body.script: IsDarkMode=false;

input.style: font-size: 1.1em; border: 0px; color: #333; border-bottom: 1px solid #858585; background-color: transparent;

ul.style: position: fixed; width: 100%; top: 42px; border-top-color: #FFF; display: block; padding: 0; border: 0;

br.span: Download historical data for 20 million indicators using your browser.
Direct access to our data from your apps using any programing language.

a.br: Manage your notifications for calendar releases and financial markets.

td.a: Current Account to GDP (% of GDP)
Government Debt to GDP (% of GDP)
Current Account to GDP (% of GDP)
Government Debt to GDP (% of GDP)
Households Debt To GDP (% of GDP)

head.title: India Forecast

meta.name: description
meta.content: Trading Economics provides data for 20 million economic indicators from 196 countries including actual values, consensus figures, forecasts, historical time series and news. India Forecast - was last updated on Monday, June 13, 2022.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: India Forecast, economic indicators, data, actual values, historical, time series, forecasts, news

body.script: IsDarkMode=false;

input.style: font-size: 1.1em; border: 0px; color: #333; border-bottom: 1px solid #858585; background-color: transparent;

ul.style: position: fixed; width: 100%; top: 42px; border-top-color: #FFF; display: block; padding: 0; border: 0;

br.span: Download historical data for 20 million indicators using your browser.
Direct access to our data from your apps using any programing language.

a.br: Manage your notifications for calendar releases and financial markets.

td.a: Current Account to GDP (% of GDP)
Government Debt to GDP (% of GDP)
Gross National Product (INR Tens Of Million)

Government Budget Value (INR Tens of Millions)

Households Debt To GDP (% of GDP)

body.script: IsDarkMode=false;

input.style: font-size: 1.1em; border: 0px; color: #333; border-bottom: 1px solid #858585; background-color: transparent;

ul.style: position: fixed; width: 100%; top: 42px; border-top-color: #FFF; display: block; padding: 0; border: 0;

br.span: Download historical data for 20 million indicators using your browser.
Direct access to our data from your apps using any programing language.

a.br: Manage your notifications for calendar releases and financial markets.

Government Debt to GDP (% of GDP)

Government Debt to GDP (% of GDP)
Government Spending to GDP (% of GDP)

All Rights Reserved

body.script: IsDarkMode=false;

input.style: font-size: 1.1em; border: 0px; color: #333; border-bottom: 1px solid #858585; background-color: transparent;

ul.style: position: fixed; width: 100%; top: 42px; border-top-color: #FFF; display: block; padding: 0; border: 0;

br.span: Download historical data for 20 million indicators using your browser.
Direct access to our data from your apps using any programing language.

a.br: Manage your notifications for calendar releases and financial markets.

body.script: IsDarkMode=false;

input.style: font-size: 1.1em; border: 0px; color: #333; border-bottom: 1px solid #858585; background-color: transparent;

ul.style: position: fixed; width: 100%; top: 42px; border-top-color: #FFF; display: block; padding: 0; border: 0;

br.span: Download historical data for 20 million indicators using your browser.
Direct access to our data from your apps using any programing language.
